articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google Search’s new ‘AI Mode’ lets users ask complex, multi-part questions - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is launching a new “AI Mode” experimental feature in Search that looks to take on Perplexity AI and OpenAI’s ChatGPT Search
articles.content: Google is launching a new AI Mode experimental feature in Search that looks to take on popular services like Perplexity AI and OpenAIs ChatGPT Search. The tech giant announced on Wednesday that the n… [+4189 chars]
